## What is it?
The final project is an essay in which you explore in greater depth a topic that we have touched on during the course. You can either choose a question from one of the ones below, or you can decide on your own topic and come up with a research question. Please let me know what research question you have chosen before starting work

-------

## When is it due?
28th February 2022 at 23:59 on Blackboard. If anyone is planning on taking the Abschlussprüfung next semester and needs to have their marks for this course ready before this time, you will need to hand in earlier. Let me know if you are planning on doing this.
